races.name: Human
races.description: Versatile and adaptable, humans are found in all corners of the world.

races.name: Elf
races.description: Graceful and long-lived, elves are known for their affinity with magic.

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Hardy and skilled in craftsmanship, dwarves thrive in mountainous regions.

races.name: Halfling
races.description: Small and agile, halflings are known for their luck and stealth.

races.name: Gnome
races.description: Curious and inventive, gnomes have a natural affinity for illusions and technology.

races.name: Half-Orc
races.description: Born of human and orc parentage, half-orcs combine strength and resilience.

races.name: Half-Elf
races.description: Descendants of humans and elves, half-elves blend the traits of both races.

races.name: Dragonborn
races.description: Humanoid dragons, dragonborns have breath weapons and dragon-like features.

races.name: Tiefling
races.description: Descendants of fiends, tieflings have infernal traits and a mysterious allure.

races.name: Aasimar
races.description: Celestial-touched beings, aasimars radiate divine light and possess celestial heritage.

races.name: Goliath
races.description: Powerful and mountain-dwelling, goliaths are known for their strength and resilience.

races.name: Kobold
races.description: Small, reptilian creatures, kobolds are skilled in traps and tactics.

races.name: Goblin
races.description: Small and cunning, goblins excel in stealth and ambush tactics.

races.name: Aarakocra
races.description: Avian humanoids with wings, aarakocra are masters of aerial maneuvers.

races.name: Triton
races.description: Amphibious and regal, tritons hail from the depths and command the power of the sea.
